text: Herot ŋgui gari guman pan ana guigira vhega mbatɨgar Taia ŋgu bakɨme gum Saidonan ŋgu bakɨmen ki gumgi gu mbigi ga mbui. Ana mbe vhegim, mbe mbaram wari tɨkhɨngiap zav ana gari. Mbe khaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe ana gari fhain kega zi mba, mbe nta pi. Mbe ana ganɨ zav, mbe fharav vov, mba ŋgui gari guman pan ki ŋaneŋ gari guman pan Brastus, phorga nzuaim, ana mbe mɨnmbarigi.
